description: Anthurium crassinervium is an amazing species of plant. It is an evergreen flowering plant with stunning heart-shaped red, blanket shaped bracts. Its glossy green leaves grow to a length of up to 8 inches, making it a great choice for any indoor or outdoor setting. Furthermore, the Anthurium has air-purifying capabilities and can help to eliminate toxins from the air. This species does not require a great deal of light or water making it easy to maintain. Plus, with its long life-span and minimal maintenance requirements, this plant is sure to bring beauty to your home for years to come.
